emails.Subject: 🌍 Volunteer Abroad: Travel to Pakistan
emails.text: Limited spots available! // Donate Now ✈️ Travel with us to Pakistan Calling all changemakers! We're hosting two Inspire Trips to Islamabad, Pakistan, and you're invited . This is your chance to volunteer abroad , connect with local communities, and support children, youth, and families through education, psychosocial programs, and community service. Choose the trip that works for you: ✈ Trip 1: November 7 to November 16, 2025 ✈ Trip 2: January 24 to February 2, 2026 Since 1992, Islamic Relief has been on the ground in Pakistan, addressing the country’s most pressing needs and challenges. As a volunteer, you’ll contribute to this ongoing work—while gaining new experiences and growing in ways you never expected. If you walk away having made an impact and learned something new, then you did Inspire right. 📷 Want to see what it’s like? Check out this recap to see how past volunteers made their impact in Pakistan! Spots are limited, don’t miss out! APPLY NOW If you have questions or concerns, you can contact the Inspire team at inspire@islamicreliefcanada.org Unsubscribe | Islamic Relief Canada 3501 Mainway, Burlington ON, L7M 1A9 CA | 1-855-377-4673 Please do not reply to this email. emails.Subject: 🏞️ Trek Pakistan with Us!
emails.text: Explore the Karakoram range // Donate Now This Is Your Calling This isn’t just a trek, it’s an adventure of the soul. Join Islamic Relief from September 18 – 28 2025 , for an unforgettable journey through Pakistan’s Karakoram range ! Over 12 days, you’ll hike through dramatic landscapes, explore ancient forts, and connect with the vibrant Balti culture. Each day on the trail brings something new — this is your chance to experience the magic of Pakistan like never before. And the best part? Every step you take and dollar you raise will bring clean water to families in need. 📍 Pakistan When: September 18-28, 2025 Registration Fee: $1,500 Fundraising Goal: $3,500 SIGN ME UP FOR THE CHALLENGE Your fundraising efforts will support our Water for Life projects, helping build long-term, sustainable solutions for water-scarce communities around the world. This is more than a hike, it’s a commitment to change. Sign up today to kickstart your adventure. Unsubscribe | Islamic Relief Canada 3501 Mainway, Burlington ON, L7M 1A9 CA | 1-855-377-4673 Please do not reply to this email. emails.Subject: Information about your application to Appian
emails.text: Hi Musab, Thank you for your interest in the Technical Software Consultant role at Appian! The hiring team has reviewed your resume and unfortunately your application wasn't selected for the next round of interviews. We received multiple applications from impressive candidates (yours included!), however, we found a few that are a closer match to our target profile. We will keep your information on file and will gladly reach out if another role opens for which we can consider you. The Appian Recruiting Team Hi Musab, Thank you for your interest in the Technical Software Consultant role at Appian! The hiring team has reviewed your resume and unfortunately your application wasn't selected for the next round of interviews. We received multiple applications from impressive candidates (yours included!), however, we found a few that are a closer match to our target profile. We will keep your information on file and will gladly reach out if another role opens for which we can consider you. The Appian Recruiting Team

emails.Subject: Canada Post: Information about potential service disruption
emails.text: Canada Post: Information about potential service disruption Canada Post: Information about potential service disruption Learn how you can stay up to date with your account(s). Important information about a potential Canada Post service disruption Hi Marium, A possible Canada Post service disruption could begin in May of this year. If it happens, the service disruption will impact the delivery of your paper statements, new and replacement TD Access Cards or TD Credit Cards, and other documents, such as mortgage renewal offers, loan renewal notifications and amendment agreements. To help you stay up to date with what's happening on your account(s), we're reaching out to let you know how you can use the TD app and EasyWeb to change your delivery preferences so that you can receive statements and other documents online. Still receiving paper statements and documents? Update your delivery preferences to help avoid mail delays. If you haven't already done so, you can change your delivery preferences using the TD app or EasyWeb. Here's how: Using the TD app Log in and tap the More icon ( ☰ ) in the bottom right corner. Select Settings , and then Statements & Documents . To switch all accounts to online delivery, select Switch Now beside Get Statements and Other Documents online . Select the Save button to save your delivery preferences. Accept the Consent to Electronic Delivery of Documents agreement. Using EasyWeb – Mobile Log in to EasyWeb at td.com and tap the Menu icon ( ☰ ) in the top left corner of the screen. Tap your name at the top of the screen (just below the circle with your initials in it), then tap Statements & Documents . Select the Manage tab in the top menu bar, then Edit your delivery preferences . Tap the Switch ALL to online box under Statements to receive statements online, and under Other Documents to receive documents online. Ensure your email is up to date and click Save Changes . Accept the Consent to Electronic Delivery of Documents agreement. Using EasyWeb – Desktop Log in to EasyWeb at td.com and click the profile icon near the top right of your screen. Select Statements & Documents from the dropdown menu. Select the Manage tab, then Edit your delivery preferences . Click the Switch ALL to online box under Statements to receive statements online, and under Other Documents to receive documents online. Ensure your email is up to date and click Save Changes . Accept the Consent to Electronic Delivery of Documents agreement. Need to make a payment? For information about your statement balance or to pay your bill, log in to the TD app or EasyWeb, call 1-866-222-3456 , or visit any TD branch or ATM in Canada. You're responsible for making payments on time, including to credit cards, mortgages, loans, and lines of credit (as applicable), even if your paper statement is delayed in the mail. Consider setting up a pre-authorized debit to make automatic payments to your TD credit card, mortgage, loan, or line of credit, or a pre-authorized payment for other monthly bills. Creating an automatic payment can help ensure that you never miss a payment. Expecting a new or replacement card? New or replacement TD Credit Card: We have alternative delivery methods for new and replacement cards to minimize disruption where possible. During the service disruption, if you need your card urgently, call us any time at 1-800-983-8472 (TTY: 1-866-704-3194 ). New or replacement TD Access Card: Pick up a new or replacement TD Access Card in person at the TD branch that's closest to you. Still receiving cheques in the mail? Consider setting up direct deposit. Your direct deposit information can be found on the TD app and EasyWeb. Use this information to set up direct deposit with Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) or your employer. For more details on how a Canada Post service disruption would impact TD services visit: www.td.com/canadapost Contact Us | Privacy | Legal Please do not reply to this email – this mailbox is not monitored. ® The TD logo and other TD trademarks are the property of The Toronto‑Dominion Bank or its subsidiaries.

emails.Subject: [Announcement] Important tax changes for Google Play purchases in Philippines and Senegal
emails.text: Senegal and Philippines Tax Changes Be aware of the following tax changes Email not displaying correctly? View it online SERVICE UPDATE Hello Musab, Please be aware of the following tax changes which will go into effect on June 1, 2025. Philippines If you are a Google Play Developer located outside the Philippines, Google is responsible for determining, charging and remitting Value Added Tax (VAT) on paid apps and in-app purchases made on Google Play by customers in the Philippines. If you are a Google Play Developer located in the Philippines, you are still responsible for determining, charging and remitting VAT on paid apps and in-app purchases made on Google Play by customers in the Philippines. We will also charge Value Added Tax (VAT) on the service fee if you are located in the Philippines but haven’t provided your Tax Identification Number (TIN) to Google. Your tax status determines the taxes you’re charged in the Philippines. Here’s how you can provide Google with your Philippines tax information : 1. Open Play Console and go to the Payments profile page. 2. In the "Settings" section, click Manage settings . 3. In the "Philippines tax info" section, click the pencil icon , and click Manage tax info . 4. Navigate to the "Philippines" country card, click the Add tax info button and enter your TIN. 5. Click Submit . Senegal Google is responsible for determining, charging and remitting Value Added Tax (VAT) on paid apps and in-app purchases made on Google Play by customers in Senegal. For more information on tax rates, please visit the Help Center . If you have any other questions, please consult your tax advisor. Thank you, Your Google Play team Help Center Community Center Notifications © 2025 Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA This message was sent to musabumair005@gmail.com to inform you about important updates on your Google Play developer account. emails.Subject: Google Cloud Platform & APIs: Your invoice is available for 0161E9-FFAB4C-C9FD67
emails.text:
Your Google Cloud Platform & APIs monthly invoice is available. Please find the PDF document attached at the bottom of this email. IMPORTANT: The balance will be automatically charged so you don't need to take any action. Domain 0161E9-FFAB4C-C9FD67 Name Musab Umair Invoice number 5250164898 Payments profile ID 9073-8786-7477 If you want to view your payment history or update your payment info, visit your account by following the instructions below: Sign in to your Google Cloud Console Open the console Navigation menu, and select Billing If you have more than one Cloud Billing account: Select Go to linked billing account to manage Cloud Billing for the current project Select Manage billing accounts to locate a different Cloud Billing account, then select the account you want to manage To review your current subscriptions, payment plans, and other relevant details, go to the Subscriptions page in the Admin console . Help center Contact us Google Cloud Platform customer ID: 0161E9-FFAB4C-C9FD67 Payments profile ID: 9073-8786-7477 Google Cloud Canada Corporation, 1741 Lower Water Street, Suite 600, Halifax, NS B3J 0J2, Canada You have received this mandatory service announcement to update you about important changes to Google Cloud Platform & APIs or your account. Google Cloud Platform & APIs Your Google Cloud Platform & APIs monthly invoice is available. Please find the PDF document attached at the bottom of this email. IMPORTANT: The balance will be automatically charged so you don't need to take any action. Domain 0161E9-FFAB4C-C9FD67 Name Musab Umair Invoice number 5250164898 Payments profile ID 9073-8786-7477 If you want to view your payment history or update your payment info, visit your account by following the instructions below:
  1. Sign in to your Google Cloud Console

  2. Open the console Navigation menu, and select Billing

    If you have more than one Cloud Billing account:

    • Select Go to linked billing account to manage Cloud Billing for the current project
    • Select Manage billing accounts to locate a different Cloud Billing account, then select the account you want to manage
To review your current subscriptions, payment plans, and other relevant details, go to the Subscriptions page in the Admin console. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Help center Contact us Google Cloud Platform customer ID: 0161E9-FFAB4C-C9FD67 Payments profile ID: 9073-8786-7477 Google Cloud Canada Corporation, 1741 Lower Water Street, Suite 600, Halifax, NS B3J 0J2, Canada You have received this mandatory service announcement to update you about important changes to Google Cloud Platform & APIs or your account. emails.Subject: Your invitation to national recent graduate survey on work placements
emails.text: Dear Musab, Riipen is excited to annouce the 2025 Canadian Survey of Recent Graduates . If you graduated from a post-secondary insitution in Canada since 2021, we invite you to participate in this national survey. We look forward to getting your valuable feedback on your experiences as a recent graduate and any experiences you may have had with work-integrated learning. Don’t miss out – ensure your opinions are included! The survey will close on May 29, 2025. Your feedback will help inform future work placement opportunities available in Canada. How to take part Click on the link below to complete the survey: Take the Survey This is a unique link for you. The survey will take approximately 10-15 minutes to complete. As a thank you Everyone who completes the survey will be entered into a draw for the following items: Five grand prizes of a $500 Visa or Mastercard prepaid gift card Thirty-five grand prizes of a $100 Visa or Mastercard prepaid gift card How we will use the information This survey is part of the evaluation of the Level UP Program. Your feedback will help inform future work placement opportunities and how the pathways of recent graduates are being impacted by work-integrated learning programs. Warm regards, Michael Dubois Senior Research Associate, SRDC gradsurvey@srdc.org Follow this link to opt out of future emails: Click here to unsubscribe Dear Musab, Riipen is excited to annouce the 2025 Canadian Survey of Recent Graduates. If you graduated from a post-secondary insitution in Canada since 2021, we invite you to participate in this national survey. Don’t miss out – ensure your opinions are included! The survey will close on May 29, 2025. Your feedback will help inform future work placement opportunities available in Canada. How to take part Click on the link below to complete the survey: Take the Survey <https://srdc.ca1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_afax5tFDCqQaKkS?Q_DL=eKElAXxJp4pB5ko_afax5tFDCqQaKkS_CGC_GYfZsi6uBWVEncm&Q_CHL=email> This is a unique link for you. The survey will take approximately 10-15 minutes to complete. As a thank you Everyone who completes the survey will be entered into a draw for the following items: * Five grand prizes of a $500 Visa or Mastercard prepaid gift card * Thirty-five grand prizes of a $100 Visa or Mastercard prepaid gift card How we will use the information This survey is part of the evaluation of the Level UP Program. Your feedback will help inform future work placement opportunities and how the pathways of recent graduates are being impacted by work-integrated learning programs. Warm regards, Michael Dubois Senior Research Associate, SRDC <https://www.srdc.org/about/> gradsurvey@srdc.org <mailto:gradsurvey@srdc.org?subject=Recent%20Graduate%20Survey> Follow this link to opt out of future emails: Click here to unsubscribe <https://srdc.ca1.qualtrics.com/subscription/manage/confirmation?recipientId=CGC_GYfZsi6uBWVEncm&libraryId=UR_czHJyJWVDwDpImq&distributionId=EMD_eKElAXxJp4pB5ko&BT=c3JkYw>

emails.Subject: Service Disruption for 2h - Wednesday May 7th
emails.text: Service Disruption for 2h - Wednesday May 7th View this email in your browser Hello, Infrastructure work is underway to strengthen the stability of our systems. This work will involve a certain number of updates which will result in a service disruption. To minimize inconvenience, we have agreed with our suppliers to a monthly maintenance schedule. The next maintenance operation is scheduled for Wednesday May 7th starting at 11pm. From that moment, some features will be inaccessible for up to 2 hours. Please carefully review the following details to understand what will and won't be possible during this period. Impact on FLEX vehicles Starting or ending a trip: During the maintenance period, it will not be possible to start or end a trip . Please plan your trips accordingly. Impact on round-trip vehicles Starting a trip: During the maintenance period, it will be possible to start a trip provided you have made your reservation at least 30 minutes before 11pm and use a key fob (or equivalent) to access the vehicle . The mobile app will not be accessible during this time. Ending a trip: During the maintenance period, it will not be possible to end a trip. Please plan your trips accordingly. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this situation. These updates are necessary to enable our systems to improve and enhance their reliability. The Communauto team © 2025 Communauto Vous recevez ce message puisque vous êtes membre du service Communauto. Want to change how you receive these emails? emails.Subject: Nouveau service en ligne gratuit – Commencez votre apprentissage du français dès maintenant !
emails.text: Nouveau service en ligne gratuit – Commencez votre apprentissage du français dès maintenant ! »» Suivez ce lien si vous ne pouvez pas voir ce courriel correctement . Bonjour, Merci d’avoir déposé une demande d’admission à un cours de français de Francisation Québec. Sachez que votre demande est toujours active. Nous communiquerons avec vous dès qu’une place sera disponible. Pour commencer votre apprentissage dès maintenant, participez au nouveau service d’apprentissage du français en ligne pour les personnes débutantes. Inscrivez-vous, c’est facile et gratuit ! Je m'inscris Vous apprendrez la communication de base, par exemple : - vous présenter, - demander et comprendre des renseignements simples, - vous déplacer dans la ville. Vous irez à votre rythme. C’est une ressource de plus pour vous aider à apprendre le français. Vous ne perdrez pas votre place dans la liste d’attente pour un cours en classe, soyez sans crainte. Sincères salutations, Direction du registraire de Francisation Québec L’État doit rendre ses services publics en français. Si une des exceptions indiquées dans la page Québec.ca/languedeservice s’applique à vous, voici des traductions de courtoisie en anglais et en espagnol . Ministère de l’Immigration, de la Francisation et de l’Intégration 1 200, boulevard Saint-Laurent, bureau 200, Montréal, Québec H2X 0C9 Si vous ne désirez plus faire partie de cette liste d'envoi du ministère de l'Immigration, de la Francisation et de l'Intégration,veuillez cliquer sur ce lien .

emails.Subject: We’ve updated some of our fees
emails.text: See what that means for you ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ Hello Musab, Some of the fees you pay are changing. In March, you should have received an email from us telling you about upcoming fee changes. Due to a technical error, you did not receive this email, however the fees were still updated on 18 April 2025. We’re sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. A summary of what’s changed We’ve made it cheaper to move money across 7 currencies, including sending money to Chinese yuan, and paying for US dollar transfers via direct debit (ACH). However, some things got more expensive, such as sending money from Japanese yen to other currencies and receiving some currencies via Swift. Use our fee calculator to see how much your next transfer will cost. Or, see a full list of updated fees and when they will apply. Read our Terms of Use or visit Wise Fees & Pricing for the most up-to-date information. If you have any questions, or if this error has caused you any issues, please get in touch . Thanks, The Wise team Want to change what we get in touch about? Go to your Notification Settings . We can’t receive replies to this email address. But if you’d like some support, please visit our Help Centre . This email was sent to you by Wise. By using our services, you agree to our customer agreements . © Wise 2025. All rights reserved. zdtag-nr-contact-form-sent

emails.Subject: Fermeture temporaire de la chute à déchets – du 1er au 2 mai 2025/ Temporary Closure of Garbage Chute – May 1 to May 2, 2025/ 垃圾投放口临时关闭通知 – 2025年5月1日至2日 亲爱的住户
emails.text: Chers résidents, Ceci est un rappel aimable concernant l'information partagée la semaine dernière : la chute à déchets sera fermée à partir du jeudi matin, 1er mai 2025, jusqu'au soir du vendredi 2 mai. Cette fermeture est nécessaire afin de réaliser des travaux sur le plancher de la salle des déchets. Pendant cette période, nous vous demandons de bien vouloir déposer vos déchets directement dans le conteneur situé au niveau inférieur de l’immeuble. Nous sommes conscients que cela peut occasionner certains désagréments et vous remercions pour votre compréhension et votre coopération. Afin d’éviter toute confusion, un ruban de sécurité ainsi que des affiches seront placés sur chaque porte de chute pour indiquer que le service est temporairement hors d’usage. N’hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous avez des questions. Cordialement, ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Dear Residents, This is a kindly reminder about the previous information shared last week regarding that the garbage chute will be closed starting Thursday morning, May 1st, 2025, until the evening of Friday, May 2nd. This closure is necessary in order to carry out work on the floor of the garbage room. During this period, we kindly ask that you bring your garbage directly to the container located on the lower level of the building. We are aware that this may cause some inconvenience and thank you for your understanding and cooperation. To avoid any confusion, caution tape and paper notices will be placed on each chute door to indicate that the chute is temporarily out of service. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. Sincerely, ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 这是对上周所发送通知的温馨提醒：垃圾投放口将于 2025年5月1日（星期四）上午 起关闭，预计至 5月2日（星期五）晚间 重新开放。 此次关闭是为了对垃圾房地面进行必要的施工。在此期间，请您将垃圾 直接投放至大楼地下层的垃圾容器 。 我们了解这可能会带来一些不便，感谢您的理解与配合。 为避免混淆，我们将在每个垃圾投放口门上粘贴警示胶带和通知，说明该投放口暂时停止使用。 如您有任何疑问，欢迎随时与我们联系。 此致敬礼， *Chers résidents,* Ceci est un rappel aimable concernant l'information partagée la semaine dernière : la chute à déchets sera fermée à partir du jeudi matin, 1er mai 2025, jusqu'au soir du vendredi 2 mai. Cette fermeture est nécessaire afin de réaliser des travaux sur le plancher de la salle des déchets. Pendant cette période, nous vous demandons de bien vouloir déposer vos déchets directement dans le conteneur situé au niveau inférieur de l’immeuble. Nous sommes conscients que cela peut occasionner certains désagréments et vous remercions pour votre compréhension et votre coopération. Afin d’éviter toute confusion, un ruban de sécurité ainsi que des affiches seront placés sur chaque porte de chute pour indiquer que le service est temporairement hors d’usage. N’hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous avez des questions. *Cordialement,* *------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------* *Dear Residents,* This is a kindly reminder about the previous information shared last week regarding that the garbage chute will be closed starting Thursday morning, May 1st, 2025, until the evening of Friday, May 2nd. This closure is necessary in order to carry out work on the floor of the garbage room. During this period, we kindly ask that you bring your garbage directly to the container located on the lower level of the building. We are aware that this may cause some inconvenience and thank you for your understanding and cooperation. To avoid any confusion, caution tape and paper notices will be placed on each chute door to indicate that the chute is temporarily out of service. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. *Sincerely,* *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------* 这是对上周所发送通知的温馨提醒：垃圾投放口将于*2025年5月1日（星期四）上午*起关闭，预计至*5月2日（星期五）晚间*重新开放。 此次关闭是为了对垃圾房地面进行必要的施工。在此期间，请您将垃圾*直接投放至大楼地下层的垃圾容器*。 我们了解这可能会带来一些不便，感谢您的理解与配合。 为避免混淆，我们将在每个垃圾投放口门上粘贴警示胶带和通知，说明该投放口暂时停止使用。 如您有任何疑问，欢迎随时与我们联系。 *此致敬礼，*

emails.Subject: Our easiest final exam: having our gifts matched!
emails.text: Take part in this meaningful tradition View in browser GIVE GIVE Dear Musab, Can you believe we’re just a few weeks away from Convocation? We’ll all be McGill grads before you know it. So much has happened in just a few short years. We’ve navigated some considerable challenges but also celebrated well-deserved achievements. We all have much to be proud of and will certainly go on to accomplish great things! For more than 30 years, graduating classes have come together to contribute to current and future McGill students. Collectively, our class has benefited from the support of those who came before us. As we look ahead, now is the chance for us to show how far our generosity can go. Join your classmates in supporting initiatives that have a direct impact on students, such as the Student Wellness Hub , which provides physical and mental health services to students, and Scholarships and Student Aid , which creates financial opportunities for students across campus. All gifts made by graduating students to these funds will be matched up to dollar for dollar, thanks to generous alumni! And you can always give to another area of the University, too. Learn more about the Senior Class Gift. Please make a symbolic gift of $20.25 in honour of our graduating class , knowing that your contribution will help pave the road to success for current and future McGill students. DOUBLE YOUR GIFT NOW DOUBLE YOUR GIFT NOW Sincerely, The Senior Class Giving Committee P.S. Your gift matters, regardless of the size or where you direct it – to your faculty or department, the Library, a club or sports team, or elsewhere. Our combined generosity shows that we are a class that’s invested in the next generation of students! emails.Subject: Thank you for your interest in Miraterra
emails.text: ##- Yes! You can reply directly to this email and Haley will get it. Just make sure it’s above this line so we can read it right. -## Dear Musab, Thank you very much for your interest in Miraterra. We sincerely appreciate the time and effort you took to submit your application for the position. After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that we will not be pursuing your candidacy any further at this time. Thank you again for your interest in Miraterra and we invite you to review future job openings on our careers page. We hope you see another position that sparks your interest! Sincerely, Miraterra Recruiting Team

In the past, you closed a USD account, and as part of closing the account, your account returns for that specific account may have been skewed. We recently released an update to correct the account returns in the affected account(s). You will see the change immediately on our web product and in our mobile product in the next app store update. You may see a large swing in your account returns, but be assured that the change is correct and reflects your account’s true returns. This change is purely visual and does not impact your investments' actual performance or value. The update ensures that your portfolio returns are now calculated correctly, reflecting the true performance of your investments over time. Importantly, all other parts of our product that show returns and any documents associated with your account were always correct. This change solely pertains to the return calculation display associated with the closed USD account and should not affect any other information you have received from us. We understand that such changes can be concerning, but rest assured that your portfolio and investment information are accurate. Our support team is happy to assist if you have any questions or need further clarification. Thank you for your continued trust in us. emails.label: Label_7412877949105455075
emails.Subject: Congratulations and Next steps
emails.text: Hello, Congratulations on having cleared the E-test! The next steps are as follows: We will be scheduling a Webinar next week to share some details about the firm, the role etc. You will receive an email with the link to that webinar some time over the next few days. After the webinar, you will be asked to confirm whether you want to continue with the process. If you do, then we will schedule a final interview - which would comprise of both technical and behavioral questions. We will share some details about what to expect in the interview and how best to prepare for it. Those who clear the interview will be given an offer to join us in the upcoming June batch. As of this moment, we plan to make the final offers before the 15 th of May. Note that if any of you have any Visa difficulties, the offer will remain valid for a year, so you will have the opportunity to join us in Jan 2026 as well. We will be reaching out soon with details of the webinar. You are encouraged to attend it and ask any questions you may have during the webinar. Don't reply to this email! Best! Rishi Mishra | Head | Futures First Canada | Twitter | LinkedIn 555 René-Lévesque Blvd W, Montreal, Quebec H2Z 1B1, Canada Mobile: +1 514-850-9274 Work: +1 646 328 4529 Ext 2101 | www.futuresfirst.com Please think about the environment before printing! The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified in this message only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party, without a written consent of the sender. emails.label: Label_7249719907569470582
emails.Subject: Share Your Thoughts on Islamic Banking in Pakistan by Participating in SBP's Survey!
emails.text: Dear Customer, Assalam o Alaikum! Meezan Bank invites you to participate in a survey being conducted by the State Bank of Pakistan to share your experiences and expectations related to Islamic banking. Your feedback will play a valuable role in understanding the views of individuals and businesses in Pakistan regarding Islamic banking If you are unable to view the image, Please click here Take the survey relevant to you now: Survey to be filled by Individuals: https://surveyctosbp.surveycto.com/collect/retail_consumer_banking_banked?caseid=undefined Survey to be filled by Businesses: https://surveyctosbp.surveycto.com/collect/identify_demand_and_supply_side_issues_of_islamic_banking_in_pakistan?caseid=undefined Regards, Meezan Bank Limited

emails.Subject: An important update to our IKEA Family Terms of Use
emails.text:
IKEA New rewards from IKEA Family Musab Umair 6275980397491026056 A new IKEA Family member benefit is coming Hej Musab, You're receiving this email update as a valued member of our IKEA Family loyalty program. Starting May 27, 2025, the IKEA Family Terms of Use will be updated to include rewards from IKEA Family. Read the updated IKEA Family Terms of Use here . Key updates include: • Details on how to collect points; • Information on how to use points to choose rewards; and • General terms of use for IKEA Family Starting May 27, 2025, points can be collected when you: • Login to the IKEA website and app; • Create and save a favourites list; • Create a gift registry; • Share your gift registry; • Book and attend a planning appointment; • Create and save a kitchen plan in the online planning tool; and • Shop in-store and online Collecting points will unlock rewards including vouchers for products, services and food. This email is intended to inform you about these upcoming changes, and no action is needed from you. Your IKEA Family account will automatically gain access to the new rewards benefit, starting on May 27, 2025. emails.Subject: Update- Junior Software Engineer at Trulioo
emails.text: Hi Musab, Thank you for taking the time to speak with me about the Junior Software Engineer position at Trulioo. Unfortunately, we have decided to move forward with other candidates at this time. While it might not be the right fit now, I would love to keep you in mind for future opportunities. Thank you again for your interest in Trulioo. We wish you the best in your job search and future endeavors. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or if there's anything else we can assist you with. All the best, Natalie Major Team Lead, Talent Acquisition 778 800 9431 Hi Musab, Thank you for taking the time to speak with me about the Junior Software Engineer position at Trulioo. Unfortunately, we have decided to move forward with other candidates at this time. While it might not be the right fit now, I would love to keep you in mind for future opportunities. Thank you again for your interest in Trulioo. We wish you the best in your job search and future endeavors. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or if there's anything else we can assist you with. All the best, Natalie Major Team Lead, Talent Acquisition 778 800 9431 ( https://www.trulioo.com/ )

emails.Subject: Got a few things to take care of? Use SAAQclic or make an appointment!
emails.text: Got a few things to take care of? Use SAAQclic or make an appointment! Need to get something done at the SAAQ? Do it using SAAQclic. It’s that handy! High Season! Need to get something done at the SAAQ? Do it using SAAQclic. It’s that handy! With SAAQclic, you can: transfer a passenger vehicle between individuals; put your vehicle into storage, take your vehicle out of storage or discard your vehicle; replace your driver’s licence or licence plate; download and print your registration certificate, and so much more! Over 70% of those who have taken a vehicle out of storage this year have done so using SAAQclic. Why not give it a try? Need help doing your operations online? Check out our tutorials. Discover all the services offered Make an appointment Can’t do what you want using SAAQclic? Make an appointment at one of our service outlets! It will save you time. SAAQclic Help Day Some SAAQ service centres will be offering assistance on Saturday, May 3, 2025 to help you take your vehicle out of storage with SAAQclic. Check the schedule and reserve a spot (in French only) We're here to help Our staff are pulling out all the stops to provide you with excellent service, especially during this busy period. Their level of commitment makes it possible to provide efficient service while keeping wait times down. Did you know? We see a sharp increase in activity each year at this time: 10.5% more clients than usual are served, which comes to more than 21,000 per day (compared to an average of 19,000); more than 5,885,330 operations were carried out at the SAAQ between April and June 2024. Veuillez ne pas répondre à ce courriel. Email sent to: musabumair005@gmail.com Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec Case postale 19600, succursale Terminus, 333, boulevard Jean-Lesage | Quebec , Quebec | G1K 8J6 | Canada | infolettresaaq@communication.saaq.gouv.qc.ca Anti‑spam policy | Report an abuse | Unsubscribe

emails.label: Label_5039532840471697976

emails.text: Adobe                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Hi Musab Umair, We hope you have been enjoying your complimentary access to Adobe Express Premium with your Adobe Acrobat plan. Complimentary access to Adobe Express Premium is coming to an end on May 25, 2025, but don’t worry, you will continue to have access to the Adobe Express free plan. If you have questions, you can visit our Helpx page to learn more. Thank you for being a valued Acrobat subscriber. Don’t hesitate to call Customer Support if you need assistance. Learn more. emails.label: Label_7412877949105455075
emails.Subject: New mail from the Canada Revenue Agency / Nouveau courrier de l'Agence du revenu du Canada
emails.text: English version *** La version française suit *** Dear MUSAB UMAIR : The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) sent you new mail online called: Notice of assessment This mail may require your attention. If you are expecting a payment, you don't need to take any further action. If you have signed up for direct deposit, the payment should be deposited into your bank account within the next 10 business days. If you don't have direct deposit, a cheque will be mailed to you. Sign in to your CRA account, select My Account and click on Mail. If you do not have a CRA account, go to the CRA web page to register: Canada[.ca]/cra-registration. The CRA does not include hyperlinks in email messages for security reasons; please enter the URL above (remove the square brackets) to find the web page. This is an automated email notification. Please do not reply. Version française *** The English version precedes *** Cher/Chère MUSAB UMAIR : L'Agence du revenu du Canada (ARC) vous a envoyé un nouveau courrier en ligne appelé : Avis de cotisation Ce courrier pourrait nécessiter votre attention. Si vous attendez un paiement, vous n'avez pas d'autres mesures à prendre. Si vous êtes inscrit au dépôt direct, le paiement devrait être déposé dans votre compte bancaire dans les 10 prochains jours ouvrables. Si vous n'êtes pas inscrit au dépôt direct, un chèque vous sera envoyé par la poste. Ouvrez une session dans votre compte de l'ARC, sélectionnez Mon dossier et cliquez sur Courrier. Si vous n'avez pas de compte de l'ARC, allez à la page Web de l'ARC pour en créer un : Canada[.ca]/arc-enregistrement. L'Agence n'inclut pas d'hyperliens dans ses courriels pour des raisons de sécurité. Veuillez entrer l'adresse URL ci-dessus (supprimer les crochets) pour trouver la page Web. Le présent message est un avis par courriel automatisé. Veuillez ne pas y répondre. emails.label: Label_8393498597313348571
emails.Subject: Revenu Quebec submission confirmation
emails.text: Wealthsimple Your tax return has been successfully submitted to RQ.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Your provincial tax return has been submitted This email is to confirm that MUSAB's 2024 tax return has been successfully submitted to Revenu Québec. The confirmation number is 5798351 . What happens now? Once your return has been processed, you'll receive a notice of assessment via My Account. If you're new to My Account, you'll need to register. For more information on how to register or log in, refer to Revenu Québec’s instructions. If you’re getting a refund, and are signed up for direct deposit, you should receive your refund within two weeks. For information on how to track the status of your refund, please see this help article. Remember to download a PDF of your tax return for your records, by using the Save PDF button at the bottom of your return. This message was sent to musabumair005@gmail.com Wealthsimple 400 – 80 Spadina Avenue Toronto, ON, M5V 2J4 Privacy Policy • View in browser Replies to this email address are not monitored. Have questions? Visit our Help Centre or submit a request to our Client Support team. Managed accounts are offered by Wealthsimple Inc., a registered portfolio manager in each province and territory of Canada. © 2025 Wealthsimple Technologies Inc. Wealthsimple Your provincial tax return has been submitted This email is to confirm that MUSAB's 2024 tax return has been successfully submitted to Revenu Québec. The confirmation number is 5798351. What happens now? Once your return has been processed, you'll receive a notice of assessment via My Account. If you're new to My Account, you'll need to register. For more information on how to register or log in, refer to Revenu Québec’s instructions. If you’re getting a refund, and are signed up for direct deposit, you should receive your refund within two weeks. For information on how to track the status of your refund, please see this help article. If you need to make a payment to Revenue Québec it’s due by April 30, 2024 to avoid interest. Your tax return has been submitted This email is to confirm that MUSAB's 2024 tax return has been successfully submitted to the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA). The confirmation number is 124TFDDDAY3 . What happens now? Once your return has been processed, you'll receive a notice of assessment in the mail or via CRA’s My Account. If you’re getting a refund, and are signed up for direct deposit, you should receive your refund within two weeks. For information on how to track the status of your refund, please see this help article . Remember to download a PDF of your tax return for your records, by using the Save PDF button at the bottom of your return. emails.label: Label_7249719907569470582
emails.Subject: Experience Riba-Free Home Financing with Meezan Bank’s Easy Home Solution!
emails.text: Dear Customer, Assalam o Alaikum! At Meezan Bank, we understand that finding the right home financing solution is essential for turning your dream home into a reality. Our Shariah-compliant interest-free home financing option, Meezan Easy Home is designed to offer you a transparent and ethical path to property ownership. How Meezan Easy Home Operates? Meezan Easy Home operates on the concept of Diminishing Musharakah, a Shariah-compliant mechanism where you and the Bank jointly own the property. The Bank leases its share of property to you against periodic rental. Moreover, you purchase Bank’s ownership share in the property over the financing tenure to ultimately become its sole owner. Key Features of Easy Home: Obtain substantial financing to secure your ideal property. Benefit from maximum financing against the value of your property. Benefit from manageable installments and a regularly reducing monthly rental. Enjoy the freedom to make partial pre-payments (early unit purchase through Musharakah buyout) and reduce your outstanding finance. Free property Takaful up to the Bank’s share (financed amount). Optional life Takaful for death and accidental/natural disability. For more information on the Shariah-compliant financing and our dedicated representatives, please visit: https://www.meezanbank.com/easy-home/ We are excited to help you find the perfect home financing solution that aligns with your values and financial goals. Regards, Meezan Bank Limited

emails.Subject: Tripadvisor - Follow Up to Your Application
emails.text: Hi Musab, Thank you so much for your interest in the Software Engineer I opening at Tripadvisor. At this time, the team has carefully considered your resume, but have ultimately decided not to move forward with your application. We truly appreciate your time and interest in our company. We encourage you to keep an eye on our careers site and apply to future opportunities. At Tripadvisor, we believe we are better together, and we hope you continue to find the good out there in the world! Best regards, Your Tripadvisor Recruiters Confidentiality Notice: This e-mail and any associated files are intended solely for the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. emails.Subject: Merci pour votre candidature chez BFL CANADA | Thank you for applying to BFL CANADA
emails.text: Bonjour Musab, Nous vous remercions de votre intérêt à joindre BFL CANADA. Nous apprécions le temps et l'effort que vous avez investis pour soumettre votre candidature. Votre candidature a bien été reçue et est actuellement en cours d'évaluation par notre équipe de recrutement. Si vos qualifications correspondent aux exigences du poste en question, nous vous contacterons pour procéder aux prochaines étapes du processus de recrutement. Vous pouvez, en tout temps, examiner l’état de votre demande et modifier votre candidature en accédant à celle-ci https://recruiting.ultipro.ca/BFL5000BFLCA/JobBoard/f11088c0-b19d-40ef-8140-c553b5ed8fb8/Candidate/ViewPresence . BFL CANADA souscrit à la Loi sur l’accès à l’égalité en emploi. Nous accueillons et encourageons les candidatures de personnes aux capacités diverses. BFL Canada s'engage à favoriser un environnement diversifié, équitable, inclusif et accessible à tous. La diversité de nos talents favorise l'innovation et la créativité grâce à des antécédents variés, une pensée différente et des connaissances uniques. Des aménagements sont disponibles sur demande pour les candidats qui participent à tous les aspects du processus de sélection. Merci encore pour votre intérêt pour BFL CANADA. Cordialement, Équipe Acquisition de talents ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Dear Musab, Thank you for your interest in joining BFL CANADA. We appreciate the time and effort you've invested in submitting your application. Your application has been received and is currently under review by our hiring team. If your qualifications align with the requirements of the role, we will reach out to you to proceed with the next steps in the hiring process. Please note that due to the volume of applications we receive, we may not be able to respond to each applicant individually. However, we value your interest in joining our team, and we will do our best to keep you informed of any updates regarding your application status. You can review the status of your application and make changes to your candidacy at any time by accessing it via https://recruiting.ultipro.ca/BFL5000BFLCA/JobBoard/f11088c0-b19d-40ef-8140-c553b5ed8fb8/Candidate/ViewPresence . We welcome and encourage applications from people with diverse abilities. BFL Canada is committed to fostering an environment that is diverse, equitable, inclusive, and accessible to all. The diversity of our talents enables innovation and creativity through diverse backgrounds, different thinking, and unique knowledge. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process. Thank you once again for your interest in BFL CANADA. Best regards, The Talent Acquisition Team Bonjour Musab, Nous vous remercions de votre intérêt à joindre BFL CANADA. Nous apprécions le temps et l'effort que vous avez investis pour soumettre votre candidature. Votre candidature a bien été reçue et est actuellement en cours d'évaluation par notre équipe de recrutement. BFL CANADA souscrit à la Loi sur l’accès à l’égalité en emploi. Nous accueillons et encourageons les candidatures de personnes aux capacités diverses. BFL Canada s'engage à favoriser un environnement diversifié, équitable, inclusif et accessible à tous. La diversité de nos talents favorise l'innovation et la créativité grâce à des antécédents variés, une pensée différente et des connaissances uniques. Des aménagements sont disponibles sur demande pour les candidats qui participent à tous les aspects du processus de sélection. Merci encore pour votre intérêt pour BFL CANADA. Cordialement, Équipe Acquisition de talents ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Dear Musab, Thank you for your interest in joining BFL CANADA. We appreciate the time and effort you've invested in submitting your application. Your application has been received and is currently under review by our hiring team. If your qualifications align with the requirements of the role, we will reach out to you to proceed with the next steps in the hiring process. Please note that due to the volume of applications we receive, we may not be able to respond to each applicant individually. However, we value your interest in joining our team, and we will do our best to keep you informed of any updates regarding your application status. You can review the status of your application and make changes to your candidacy at any time by accessing it via https://recruiting.ultipro.ca/BFL5000BFLCA/JobBoard/f11088c0-b19d-40ef-8140-c553b5ed8fb8/Candidate/ViewPresence. We welcome and encourage applications from people with diverse abilities. BFL Canada is committed to fostering an environment that is diverse, equitable, inclusive, and accessible to all. The diversity of our talents enables innovation and creativity through diverse backgrounds, different thinking, and unique knowledge. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process. Thank you once again for your interest in BFL CANADA. Best regards, The Talent Acquisition Team
